abstract: Northrop Grumman wins Pentagon contract to build next-generation long-range strike bomber.
lead_paragraph: The contract, which could expand to $80 billion eventually, is to build long-range strike bombers to replace the B-1 and B-52 bombers.

headline.main: Northrop Grumman Wins $21.4 Billion Pentagon Contract
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Northrop Grumman Is Chosen by Pentagon to Build Bomber

snippet: The contract, which could expand to $80 billion eventually, is to build long-range strike bombers to replace the B-1 and B-52 bombers.
